data.title: Ali Farahi shares the details of his social media journey
data.meta_description: With content being the real hero today, many digital media companies lay emphasis on creating good content.
data.text:
The fast growth of social media has seen many people getting into the field of advertising, marketing and content creation. Ali Farahi, popularly known as Sina Farahi possess the qualification of an engineer but is a social media influencer by choice. In early 2009, when Facebook was the growing social media platform, Ali spent his most of the time on social media and after understanding the basics of how a digital media functions; he founded a Persian digital media agency.

With content being the real hero today, many digital media companies lay emphasis on creating good content. However, Ali’s main focus has been on creating the content which the audience can relate to. With an endless growth of content in today’s era, the young digital mind experiments with his content based on the latest social media trends. Sharing his views about the same, he said, "Today's era is growing at a rapid pace and digitalization is reaching new heights. As an influencer, I make sure to create the content which has a universal appeal and due to cut-throat competition I need to make sure that my content stands apart from all."

In the year 2013, he became the social media manager of Varzesh3 website. Two years later, he became a manager of Fast Click agency. Simultaneously he co-founded a startup with Iran’s popular celebrity Rambod Javan. The duo collaborated and started their own venture named Tag Star. Not only this, in 2018 Ali Farahi unveiled the world’s biggest teacup in Iran. In the same year later, the influencer started Hashtag Media Company which is known for many successful advertising campaigns in Iran. Initially, he struggled with having limited resources but with time, Ali’s hard work paid off and he became one of the most influential names in the advertising world.
